inputs.description: Time series of vegetation index. Format is expected to be multilayer envi, tif or single variable netcdf file. The band name need to have time information
inputs.name: Input archive URL

inputs.description: The model would assume changes in seasonality across years beyond the mean, true or false
inputs.name: Yearly change

inputs.description: The model would register time and effect of larger change within the year, true or false
inputs.name: Yearly Event

inputs.description: The model would output only expected values and estimated errors, true or false
inputs.name: Output Expected Value

inputs.description: Temporal frequency using by the model to estimate correct output
inputs.name: Temporal Frequency of model sampling

inputs.description: Model should not use information from others years to fit data of a given year, true or false
inputs.name: Sufficently dense data across years

outputs.description: Output image in ENVI format showing Time Series Statistics. First 3 layers are the Ecological Functional Attributes.\n pvalue and Rsq are the significance and the explained variance of the Harmonic model. Liupvalue is the probability that the residual have autocorrelated signal
outputs.name: Output image
